product_name: Burton AK BK Insulator Jacket - Men's
long_description: Insulated with quality down, the Burton AK BK Insulator jacket packs down small yet delivers big warmth to save the day when you're caught out in the cold. Lightweight 20-denier ripstop nylon shell has a Durable Water Repellent coating to help shed light rain and snow. Jacket is insulated with quality 550-fill-power goose down for warmth, light weight and compressibility. Pit zippers let you vent body heat quickly. The Burton AK BK Insulator jacket features fleece-lined handwarmer pockets and a zippered chest pocket.
short_description: Insulated with quality down, the Burton AK BK Insulator jacket packs down small yet delivers big warmth to save the day when you're caught out in the cold.
